categoriesExplanation: The playlist, titled 'Hot Girl Treadmill Walks 🍑💦', explicitly indicates its purpose as a treadmill workout, which is strongly reinforced by the title and associated imagery ("Hot Girl" and "Treadmill" suggest focus on energetic walking or running on a treadmill).
